blogPost.title: How can speech recognition be used productively in the classroom? Answer by @ScanlonPatricia, Founder/CEO @soapboxlabs. https://t.co/xFtN2nxPnG https://t.co/L4msPxGgg8
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 音声認識を教室でどのように活用すればよいのでしょうか。Answer by @ScanlonPatricia, Founder/CEO @soapboxlabs. https://t.co/xFtN2nxPnG https://t.co/L4msPxGgg8
语音识别如何在课堂上卓有成效地使用？回答者：@ScanlonPatricia, 创始人/CEO @soapboxlabs. https://t.co/xFtN2nxPnG https://t.co/L4msPxGgg8
語音識別如何在課堂上卓有成效地使用？回答者：@ScanlonPatricia, 創始人/CEO @soapboxlabs. https://t.co/xFtN2nxPnG https://t.co/L4msPxGgg8

previous.title: What are the benefits of prioritizing customer experience when designing a product? Answer by Poulomi Damany, General Manager of Assets at Credit Karma. https://t.co/d5p299BxU5 https://t.co/b7uVMnYx5M

localize.full_text: 製品設計時にカスタマー・エクスペリエンスを優先することのメリットは何ですか？回答者：Poulomi Damany（Credit Karma社アセット部門ジェネラルマネージャー） https://t.co/d5p299BxU5 https://t.co/b7uVMnYx5M
在设计产品时，优先考虑客户体验的好处是什么？回答者：Poulomi Damany，Credit Karma的资产部总经理。https://t.co/d5p299BxU5 https://t.co/b7uVMnYx5M
在設計產品時，優先考慮客戶體驗的好處是什麼？回答者：Poulomi Damany，Credit Karma的資產部總經理。https://t.co/d5p299BxU5 https://t.co/b7uVMnYx5M

next.title: What is the future of real estate? Answer by @KunalLunawat, GP & Co-founder at @AgyaVentures. https://t.co/uBOH5btwHk https://t.co/iAPlqcYgLW

localize.full_text: 不動産の未来とは？GP & Co-founder at @AgyaVentures の @KunalLunawat 氏による回答です。https://t.co/uBOH5btwHk https://t.co/iAPlqcYgLW
房地产的未来是什么？由@KunalLunawat，GP & @AgyaVentures的联合创始人回答。https://t.co/uBOH5btwHk https://t.co/iAPlqcYgLW
房地產的未來是什麼？由@KunalLunawat，GP & @AgyaVentures的聯合創始人回答。https://t.co/uBOH5btwHk https://t.co/iAPlqcYgLW
